meanings.sent1: She defies the rules by always speaking her mind.
meanings.sent2: The brave knight defies the dragon to save the princess.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat defies gravity by climbing up the curtains.
meanings.sent4: His determination defies all odds and leads him to success.
meanings.sent5: The rebellious teenager defies authority at every turn.

meanings.definition: To refuse to obey or comply with something
meanings.sent1: The criminal defies the law by continuing to commit crimes.
meanings.sent2: The student defies the teacher's instructions and does his own thing.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn toddler defies bedtime by staying up late.
meanings.sent4: Her strong will defies any attempt to control her.
meanings.sent5: The defiant protester defies the orders to disperse and stands their ground.
